snippet: Glossy photos of a smiling Linda Sobek decorated a church where mourners remembered the model for the vibrancy of her life and the sadness of her death.          "I remember that smile," said Eric Dickerson, a running back who knew the former Los ...
lead_paragraph: Glossy photos of a smiling Linda Sobek decorated a church where mourners remembered the model for the vibrancy of her life and the sadness of her death. "I remember that smile," said Eric Dickerson, a running back who knew the former Los Angeles Raiders cheerleader when he played on the team. "She was a real cheerful person. She just didn't deserve that."

headline.main: Friends and Family Mourn Slain Model
